DataShape.description: Collection of statistics describing model performance
DataShape.name: AnalyticsValidationMetrics

FieldDefinition.description: Percent of records that were correctly predicted (BOOLEAN, CATEGORICAL goals)
FieldDefinition.name: accuracy

FieldDefinition.description: Area under the ROC curve (BOOLEAN goals)
FieldDefinition.name: areaUnderCurve

FieldDefinition.description: Expanded metrics for specific bins (CONTINUOUS goals)
FieldDefinition.name: binErrors

FieldDefinition.description: The confusion matrix of the predictions (BOOLEAN, CATEGORICAL, ORDINAL goals)
FieldDefinition.name: confusionMatrix

FieldDefinition.description: Number of records observed false but predicted true (BOOLEAN goals)
FieldDefinition.name: falsePositiveRate

FieldDefinition.description: Matthews Correlation Coefficient is a comparison of true and false positives with true and false negatives (BOOLEAN, CATEGORICAL goals)
FieldDefinition.name: mcc

FieldDefinition.description: Linear correlation between actual and predicted scores (-1 to 1, where 0 = no correlation and -1 or 1 = high correlation) (CONTINUOUS, ORDINAL goals)
FieldDefinition.name: pearsonCorrelation

FieldDefinition.description: Precision or Positive Predictive Value represents the fraction of true positives from positive instances predicted (BOOLEAN goals)
FieldDefinition.name: precision

FieldDefinition.description: Recall, Sensitivity, or True Positive Rate represents the fraction of true positives from total positive instances (BOOLEAN goals)
FieldDefinition.name: recall

FieldDefinition.description: Root Mean Squared Error is the standard deviation of the differences between actual and predicted scores (CONTINUOUS, ORDINAL goals)
FieldDefinition.name: rmse

FieldDefinition.description: RMSE with scores normalized between 0 and 1 (CONTINUOUS, ORDINAL goals)
FieldDefinition.name: rmseNormalized

FieldDefinition.description: R-Squared measures how well a model fits to data (CONTINUOUS goals)
FieldDefinition.name: rSquared

FieldDefinition.description: Adjusted R-Squared modifies the R-Squared value by taking into account the number of predictors used in the model (CONTINUOUS goals)
FieldDefinition.name: rSquaredAdjusted

FieldDefinition.description: Specificity, or True Negative Rate represents the fraction of true negatives from total negative instances (BOOLEAN goals)
FieldDefinition.name: specificity

FieldDefinition.description: Number of records observed true and predicted true (BOOLEAN goals)
FieldDefinition.name: truePositiveRate
